name: Wooden Wand
description: Wand made with oak wood infuced with a phoenix feather from the first pheonix bird.

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A cloak that makes you disapare

name: Bat's Blood
description: Blood that comes from the bats in the deepest caves of Canada

name: Fenny Snake Fillet
description: Fillet from Fenny snake from the swampy district of eastern England.

name: Creatures of darkness - Book
description: A book about the creatures of darkness, whriten by the amazing Linguin Lupini

name: Dragon Egg
description: Dragon eggs are large eggs with tiny scales, which shimmer like polished metal in the sunlight. Dragon eggs come in a variety of rich colors.

name: Blizzard Potion
description: The best elixir to drink right before combat, gives you extra power for dangerous situations.

name: Crystal Ball
description: A crystal ball, also known as an orbuculum or crystal sphere, is a crystal or glass ball and common fortune-telling object. It is generally associated with the performance of clairvoyance and scrying in particular.
